--- STDOUT
// Generated by Igor's Owl Compiler 0.103 (alpha)
package main ;
import owl.runtime.RT ;
public final class return_expr3
{
  static int foo (
      int x
  )
  {
    int _t_a = 1 + x ;
    int _t_b = x * _t_a ;
    return _t_b ;
  }
  public static void main (
      String[] argv
  )
  {
    int _t_a = foo ( 2 );
    RT.println ( _t_a );
  }
}
--- STDERR
